ygData.subject: Re: Erud vs Felwithe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For Erudin, I don t know. As for Kelethin, I have done mail quests a lot of times, and thus am viewed warmly by the merchants over the bard s guild, so I
ygData.messageBody:
According to PHAEDRA WHITLOCK:
> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> Thats a thought...
>
> I shepherded a novice Erudite to Freeport over the weekend, it was my first time in Erud and Tox.... Erud is very beautiful! I port to Felwithe to do my selling now, but my faction with merchants there is apprehensive. Ive only found 1 thing that will help that faction, releasing elf prisoners in Crushbone.
>
> Are there any other ways to get faction with Felwithe merchants, Erudin merchants or as last resort, Kelethin?

For Erudin, I don't know. As for Kelethin, I have done mail quests a lot of times,
and thus am viewed warmly by the merchants over the bard's guild, so I have good
prices there :)

--
Vincent ARCHER -=-=- Herve Schauer Consultants -=-=- archer@...
